mapper.select: SELECT fp.id AS id, fp.user_id AS userId, fp.spu_id AS spuId, sp.price AS spuPrice, sp.title AS spuTitle, sp.img AS spuImg, fp.created_time AS createdTime, fp.updated_time AS updatedTime FROM lm_footprint AS fp, lm_spu AS sp WHERE fp.spu_id = sp.id AND fp.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY fp.updated_time DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{size}
